name: Onecub
overview:
Onecub manages your relations with your online suppliers.

For the user, Onecub highlights important information sent by online goods and services suppliers. It automatically sorts, classifies and prioritizes web based emails. You commercial and administrative life is displayed in an ergonomic interface, so that you will never miss password changes, order tracking, travel change notifications, etc.

For suppliers, Onecub wants your clients to see you as a partner more than a commodity provider. It offers a new loyalty channel and communication tool. We facilitate communication by integrating website contact forms directly into its interface. It also provides an aggregated 360° view of your clients over all their data sources, while still protecting users’ privacy.
